title: 阿尔及利亚总统答应本月底下台
contents:
习近平的未来。82岁的阿尔及利亚总统在轮椅上坐了四年，赖着不下台。面对日益不满的民众抗议，今天这家伙终于答应本月底下台，但愿不是愚人节的忽悠。 https://t.co/Vfgx1Qck2Z



BREAKING: Algerian Leader to Resign

Abdelaziz Bouteflika, the 82-year-old leader of Algeria, will step down by the end of April, according to Algerian state media.


AFP news agency
✔@AFP
#BREAKING Algeria's President Abdelaziz Bouteflika to resign by April 28, according to state media
[url=https://twitter.com/intent/like?tweet_id=1112749997395771393][/url]62
12:14 AM - Apr 2, 2019

[url=https://twitter.com/AFP/status/1112749997395771393][/url]
[url=https://twitter.com/AFP/status/1112749997395771393][/url]85 people are talking about this 



Bouteflika, who has not been seen in public since he suffered a stroke in 2013, announced plans to run for re-election, but changed his mind following a serious of protests in Algeria.

As part of Monday’s announcement, Bouteflika’s office said he would take “important steps to ensure the continuity of the functioning of state institutions” during the transition period.
He has been in the office of the presidency since 1999.
